alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:33PM CDT until July 16 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM CDT FOR EASTERN HOLT COUNTY... At 133 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near O`Neill, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... O`Neill, Page, Inman, Emmet, Opportunity, Midway and Scottville. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 300 and 321. Highway 281 between mile markers 169 and 203. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
